title: HOW TO FIX FLAT TIRES FOR 10 YEARS

tasks.task: Replace flat tire using flat-out sealant.
subtasks: Gather necessary materials: flat-out sealant, valve tool, hose, multi-seal.
Rotate tire so valve stem is upward.
Remove valve core using provided tool.
Pump in sealant (32 ounces for 27-inch tire).
Check next day if tire remains inflated.

tasks.task: Balance tires for even wear.
subtasks: Assess tire weight after adding sealant.
Check tire manufacturer's notes on balancing.

tasks.task: Prepare for future flats.
subtasks: Apply sealant to other potential flat tires (tractors, etc.).
